original_text: If the people still turn away from God, he will be even more angry. They will not turn away from their sin.
korean_text: 너희가 이같이 될지라도 내게 청종하지 아니하고 내게 대항할진대

sentences.original_text: If the people still turn away from God
he will be even more angry
They will not turn away from their sin
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 죄에서 떠나지 않을 것입니다
